entities.name: NVIDIA CORPORATION
entities.description: NVIDIA Corporation is an American multinational technology company incorporated in Delaware and based in Santa Clara, California. It designs graphics processing units (GPUs) for the gaming and professional markets, as well as system on a chip units (SoCs) for the mobile computing and automotive market.

entities.name: RSU
entities.description: A restricted stock unit (RSU) is a grant valued in terms of company stock, but company stock is not issued at the time of the grant. The company awards them to employees as a form of compensation.

entities.name: PSU
entities.description: A performance stock unit (PSU) is a company stock given to managers and executives only if certain company-wide performance criteria are met, such as earnings per share targets.

entities.name: ESPP
entities.description: An employee stock purchase plan (ESPP) is a company-run program in which participating employees can purchase company shares at a discounted price.

relationships.relationship_description: NVIDIA Corporation grants restricted stock units (RSUs) to employees as part of their equity incentive plans.
NVIDIA Corporation grants performance stock units (PSUs) to managers and executives based on company-wide performance criteria.
NVIDIA Corporation offers an employee stock purchase plan (ESPP) allowing employees to purchase company shares at a discounted price.
